questions.question: What is the SI unit of force?
questions.explanation: The Newton (N) is the SI unit of force, named after Isaac Newton.

questions.question: An object at rest will remain at rest unless acted upon by an external force.
questions.explanation: This is Newton's First Law of Motion, also known as the law of inertia.

questions.question: The formula F = ma represents Newton's ___ Law
questions.explanation: F = ma is Newton's Second Law, stating that force equals mass times acceleration.
